$! 
The thresholds for registering for VAT or joining a VAT accounting scheme. 
$! 

##VAT thresholds

Circumstance | Threshold 
- | - | -
VAT [registration](/vat-registration "VAT registration") | £77,000 or more 
Registration for [distance selling](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/vat/managing/international/distance-selling.htm "VAT and distance selling"){:rel="external"} into the UK | £70,000 or more
Registration for [bringing goods into the UK from the EU](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/vat/start/register/when-to-register.htm#3 "Acquisitions"){:rel="external"} (known as 'acquisitions') | £77,000 or more
Completing [simplified EC Sales List](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/vat/managing/international/esl/reporting-esl.htm "EC Sales List"){:rel="external"} | £72,500 or less and supplies to EU countries £10,000 or less 

##VAT accounting scheme thresholds

VAT accounting scheme | Threshold to join scheme | Threshold to leave scheme
- | - | -
[Flat Rate Scheme](/vat-flat-rate-scheme "VAT Flat Rate Scheme") | £150,000 or less | More than £230,000
[Cash Accounting Scheme](/vat-cash-accounting-scheme "VAT Cash Accounting Scheme") | £1.35 million or less  | More than £1.6 million
[Annual Accounting Scheme](/vat-annual-accounting-scheme "VAT Annual Accounting Scheme") | £1.35 million or less  | More than £1.6 million

There are different thresholds for other schemes like the [VAT Retail schemes.](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/vat/forms-rates/rates/rates-thresholds.htm "Other VAT thresholds"){:rel="external"}

% The threshold is based on your [VAT taxable turnover](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/vat/start/register/when-to-register.htm#6 "Calculate your VAT taxable turnover"){:rel="external"} - the total of everything sold that isn't VAT exempt. %



*[VAT]: Value Added Tax
